page.title: 01Richmond-First Impressions
page.content: I have been at Richmond for about 4 months now and I think it is really boring.I used to live in Yarm.I wish I still was! One place that is better is the swimming pool.Richmond Baths is the best I have been to except for Sunderland. We moved to Richmond because my dad wanted to be nearer his work. Dad and Mum think Richmond is better than Yarm Richmond shops are not as good as those in Yarm. When I am older and at Richmond School my sister said I will do a topic on Richmond so I might get to find out a lot more about the place and begin to like it better. Suzanne Linsley
